classes.title: Contemporary Flow
classes.description: An expressive contemporary class focusing on fluid movement and emotional storytelling. Perfect for intermediate to advanced dancers looking to explore their artistic voice.

classes.title: Hip-Hop Fundamentals
classes.description: Learn the foundations of hip-hop dance with emphasis on groove, rhythm, and authentic street dance culture. All levels welcome!

classes.title: Jazz Fusion Workshop
classes.description: High-energy jazz class combining classic technique with modern commercial movement. Great for building performance quality and stage presence.

classes.title: Beginner Ballet Basics
classes.description: Perfect introduction to ballet for adult beginners. Focus on proper technique, posture, and basic positions in a supportive environment.

classes.title: Afrobeats Dance Party
classes.description: Celebrate African culture through vibrant Afrobeats choreography. Learn traditional and contemporary moves in a fun, inclusive atmosphere.

classes.title: Lyrical Expression
classes.description: Emotional storytelling through movement. This lyrical class emphasizes connection between music, emotion, and physical expression.

classes.title: Vogue Technique
classes.description: Learn the art of voguing with authentic technique and history. Explore different vogue styles including Old Way, New Way, and Vogue Fem.

classes.title: Modern Dance Intensive
classes.description: Intensive modern dance class focusing on floor work, release technique, and improvisation. For intermediate to advanced dancers.

classes.title: Commercial Dance Bootcamp
classes.description: High-energy commercial dance class perfect for music videos and performances. Learn sharp, dynamic choreography with attitude and style.

classes.title: Salsa Social Dancing
classes.description: Learn salsa basics and social dancing techniques. Partner work included - come solo or with a friend! All levels welcome.
